quotes.quote: Maybe the hardest part of life is just having the courage to try.
quotes.author: Rachel Hollis

quotes.quote: You get in life what you have the courage to ask for.
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.quote: Whenever it comes to doing anything. Remember the part about having confidence.
Life's struggles are necessary for growth.
Be humble. Be hungry. And always be the hardest worker in the room.
The greatest test of courage on the earth is to bear defeat without losing heart.
quotes.author: Robert G. Ingersoll

quotes.quote: Your power exists in the present moment. Stand up, take action, and make it happen.
Efforts and courage are not enough without purpose and direction.
quotes.author: John F. Kennedy

quotes.quote: The strength isn't in avoiding the storm, it's in rising above it.
She never allowed the external world to change her soul, that was her magic.
My life has been long, and believing that life loves the liver of it, I have dared to try many things, sometimes trembling, but daring, still.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: The high road of grace will get you somewhere a whole lot faster than the freeway of spite.
Strive toward what you know you must achieve, in confident & courageous manner.
After a series of traumas, one can lose the capacity to feel fear appropriately.
Even the strongest soldiers fall. Find the strength to get back up.
To create one's own world takes courage.
quotes.author: Georgia O'Keeffe

quotes.quote: Grow through what you go through.
Being vulnerable is a strength, not a weakness.
Embrace your darkness, and you'll never have to fear it again.
People have this capacity within them to set the world straight.
quotes.author: Jordan Peterson

quotes.quote: You'll only make progress when you're brave enough to step outside of your comfort zone.
Obstacles are there to prove your strength, not your weakness.
We must have the courage to let go of the past if we are going to grasp the future.
If only I could spend all days surrounded by people brave enough to open their hearts for real.
The bravest people are the ones who learn to ignore the doubts in their minds.
If your heart is conflicted, teach it to be unrestricted.
Never let the fear of failure stand between you and your biggest dreams.
Overcoming what frightens you the most strengthens you the most.
quotes.author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quotes.quote: Go forward bravely, the strength will come to you.
A rainbow is most beautiful after the storm. Be the rainbow.
A good conscience is eight parts of courage.
quotes.author: Robert Louis Stevenson

quotes.quote: Because of a great love, one is courageous.
Sometimes, simply starting is the hardest step. Take a big breath and an even bigger step.
Overthinking can get in the way of action. Sometimes you have to just take that leap.
Growth means change and change involves risk, stepping from the known to the unknown.
quotes.author: George Shinn

quotes.quote: Courage is very important. Like a muscle, it is strengthened by use.
quotes.author: Ruth Gordon

quotes.quote: Courage doesn't always roar.
Be brave enough to accept uncertainty. Nothing changes unless everything changes.
Have the courage to take off your mask and be humbled.
Excuses are obstacles that you create when you don't have confidence in your dreams.
